channel.title: RFI Scanner.net
channel.description:
Well, this is a tool i made to search files for RFI (Remote File Inclusion) Vulnerabilities using regular expressions. It's easy to handle, and it's fast. You choose the file(s) to search and a file containing the regular expressions (one on each line), and run it. The results will then be shown in detail.
Screenshot: [img]http://www.speljohan.net/images/RFIScanner.PNG[/img]
[b]NOTE: You will need .net framework 2.0 to run this application[/b] If you find any bugs, please either reply here or PM me, and i will fix them.
Download Link: [url=http://www.speljohan.net/downloads/RFIScanner.rar]http://www.speljohan.net/downloads/RFIScanner.rar[/url]
If you don't know what RFI is, then this tool won't be of any use for you.
Enjoy :)

item.title: RFI Scanner.net
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Speljohan:

lolol, i can’t. It will only scan through files from your computer, and since php is server-side i can’t access it.

Oh, nevermind :o. I Misunderstood the idea of this. I thought it was one to those scanners where you hit the run button and it starts attacking a site and reports the results. My bad.

Read full topic
